body_html:
Hi @asimshankar I am defining a new Op in which a Caffe model is called. Its return value can be computed by the forward inference of Caffe in tf.py_func following this post. For the gradient function of the new Op, I want to use the backpropagation of Caffe to compute gradients. Otherwise, I need to take some efforts to convert the Caffe model to tensorflow.

Thanks for your suggestion about SqrtGrad. I will try to define a custom Op for the gradient.

For the gradient function of the new Op, I want to use the backpropagation of Caffe to compute gradients. Otherwise, I need to take some efforts to convert the Caffe model to tensorflow.
Thanks for your suggestion about SqrtGrad. I will try to define a custom Op for the gradient.
body:
Hi @asimshankar I am defining a new Op in which a Caffe model is called. Its return value can be computed by the forward inference of Caffe in tf.py_func following this [post](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39048984/tensorflow-how-to-write-op-with-gradient-in-python). For the gradient function of the new Op, I want to use the backpropagation of Caffe to compute gradients. Otherwise, I need to take some efforts to convert the Caffe model to tensorflow.

Thanks for your suggestion about SqrtGrad. I will try to define a custom Op for the gradient.
